text: Haeba ruri u ba botsa hore na ke mang ea hlotseng maholimo le lefats’e, ba tla re: “Ke Allah.” E re: “Lea bona? Lintho tseo le bitsang ho tsona ntle ho Allah, – Na li ka thibela Kotlo, haeba Allah a nkabetse Kotlo? – Kapa A nkabetse Mohau Oa Hae, na li ka thibela Mohau Oa Hae?” E re: “Allah U ntekane. Bohle ba nang le ts’epo ba behe ts’epo ea bona ho Eena.”
